description: Ms. codex. Title from title page (fol. 3a). 21 lines per page. Written in medium small naskh with elements of taʻlīq in black ink with use of red for overlining and for the word "qawluh" (spaces for the latter left blank on some leaves). Thin light biscuit paper with large laid lines and pulp visible. Fol. 416b-418b: Blank. Fol. 1 and 417-418 are a later added flyleaves on European paper with watermark, with inscriptions on fol. 1a. Inscription in Arabic script on a label pasted on the pastedown of the upper cover: "Ḥāʼ 213/2". Inscription in red pencil in Arabic script on fol. 1a: "Uṣūl 1/78". Copy completed on 1 Jumādá al-Ākhar 988 [July 14, 1580] (colophon, fol. 416a). Incipit: الحمد لله على شمول نعمه الجسام ... وبعد فان ارباب العقول مطابقون واصحاب النقل متوافقون على ان العلم وان تشعت افاننه ... [4أ] ... قوله الحمد لله الذى احكم بكتابه اصول الشريعة الغراء الخ الاحكام الاتقان والكتاب فى اللغة كالكتب [4ب] لكتب والكتابة مصدر كتب Explicit: ترك السقوط ولا يجوز ان يجوز سقوط الصلاة فى الجملة بالاعذار ولا يجوز السقوط حرمة تركها فى الجملة بالاعذار هذا آخر ما اردنا ايراده فى حواشى الكتاب مستعينا بالملك الوهاب والحمد لله رب العالمين والصلاة على سيدنا محمد واله اجمعين الطيبين الطاهرين
author: Fanārī, Ḥasan ibn Muḥammad Shāh, 1436 or 7-1481 or 2.
abstract: Gloss on Talwīḥ fī kashf ḥaqāʼiq al-Tanqīḥ, a commentary by Masʻūd ibn ʻUmar al-Taftazānī (d. 791/1389) on Tanqīḥ al-uṣūl, a treatise on uṣūl al-fiqh by ʻUbayd Allāh ibn Masʻūd al-Maḥbūbī (d. 747/1346).
alternative: Ḥāshiyat ʻalá al-Talwīḥ lil-Mawlá Ḥasan Chalabī
حاشية على التلويح للمولى حسن چلبي
extent: 418 leaves: paper ; 230 x 160 (140 x 90) mm. bound to 230 x 160 mm.
provenance: Four ownership statements on fol. 3a, in the name of Muḥammad ibn al-Walī, dated 26 Dhū al-Ḥijjah 1008 (or 1006?) [July 1600 or 1598]; of ...?, dated 1051 H. [1641 or 2] ; of Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad ibn Isḥāq ; of Aḥmad Najīb, dated 20 [Shawwā]l 1279 [April 1863]. Acquired from Abraham Shalom Yahuda, 1942.
creator: Fanārī, Ḥasan ibn Muḥammad Shāh, 1436 or 7-1481 or 2.
فناري، حسن بن محمد شاه
subject: Taftāzānī, Masʻūd ibn ʻUmar, 1322-1389?—Talwīḥ fī kashf ḥaqāʼiq al-Tanqīḥ—Commentaries—15th century
binding_note: Dark brown leather over paper pasteboards for upper and lower covers. Traces of a now wanting envelope flap. Both covers have a red stamped central mandorla with an arabesque and an outer border consisting of fillets. Blue paper pastedowns. Rebacked.
member_of_collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
